about_the_game:
What the HELL is an action rogue-lite game where you battle demons in different hell-themed levels and destroy bosses. In each mission, you'll choose unique active abilities and create your own distinct skill set, utilize interactive environmental objects, develop your characters, complete various tasks, and show the hellish overlords who's boss!

The story takes place in a modern world dominated by powerful and influential demon lords in world politics, where humanity has access to dark demonic powers and resources but pays a terrible price for it.

A team decided to put an end to the hidden plans of the demon lords. They formed a special team composed of carefully selected highly trained soldiers and scientists from all over the world, and they officially declared war on hell. You step into the shoes of an angry commander assigned to venture through the depths of hell, fighting your way forward.

Game Features



  • 40+ unique active abilities
  • A military and hell-themed bullet hell survival shooter!
  • An innovative vehicle system that adds variety! You can use vehicles like police cars, airplanes, tanks found on the map to cover long distances and engage enemies in different ways.
  • A stamina system that deepens the gameplay! A flexible system that rewards players who master stamina usage and helps each player create their own playstyle.
  • Different settings with the hell concept reimagined for levels.
  • Develop your character and create a unique skill set by choosing from hundreds of passive traits using the demon's souls you collect during missions.
  • In the chapter selection screen, you can choose various operations with different objectives.
  • Obliterate hordes of incoming hell creatures with great satisfaction!



As a specially trained operator, you will benefit from humanity's technological wonders as you battle waves of incoming monsters, and descend into the depths of hell to corner the dark lords and crush evil at its core!

  • Processor: Intel I7 870
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

short_description: ﻿What the HELL is a rogue-lite top-down shooter. A terrifying future awaits the modern world under the influence of demon lords. Choose varied features to create your own skill set and determine your gameplay style. Collect demon's souls and never stop until you become stronger than they are.
